TopicTitle: v0.90 - HotRockets/SmokeScreen techniques - Massive exhaust plume?

Articles.Content:
I recently bought a computer capable of running Astronomers, and I've just finished getting SmokeScreen to work in v0.90. Does anyone know how to get this effect:

Krotchety Old Modders - Kerbin Cup Entry album pictures

This picture and the next three are hands down the most epic exhaust plumes I've ever seen in Kerbal. I would love to add them to my KSP channel and stream. If anyone knows the settings to get this to work, I would be very grateful (And I'd give you a shout out in my next video if I can get them working!).

- Avera9eJoe

Edited January 12, 2015 by Avera9eJoe
[0.25] Crotchety Old Mod - Parts and FX for a NASA Mars Mission

[0.25] Crotchety Old Mod - Parts and FX for a NASA Mars Mission

GG thanks a ton. Rep!
